Values: Should be a file name listed in the configuration ``atlite: cutouts:`` (e.g. 'europe-2013-era5') or reference an existing folder in the directory ``cutouts``. Source module must be ERA5.
Description: Specifies the directory where the relevant weather data ist stored.

Values: One of turbine types included in `atlite <https://github.com/PyPSA/atlite/tree/master/atlite/resources/windturbine>`_
Description: Specifies the turbine type and its characteristic power curve.
Allowable density of wind turbine placement.

column5: "Wind correction factor to account for wake losses. It gets multiplied by the theoretical maximum in the cutout to account for wake losses."

Values: Any subset of the `Copernicus Land Cover code list <https://land.copernicus.eu/pan-european/corine-land-cover/clc2018>`_
Description: Specifies areas based on CLC which generally eligible for AC-connected offshore wind turbine placement.
Switch to exclude `Natura 2000 <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Natura_2000>`_ natural protection areas. Area is excluded if ``true``.
Maximum sea water depth at which wind turbines can be build. Maritime areas with deeper waters are excluded in the process of calculating the AC-connected offshore wind potential.

Maximum distance to the shore beyond which wind turbines with AC connections cannot be build. Such areas far away from shore are excluded in the process of calculating the AC-connected offshore wind potential.
Method to compute the maximal installable potential for a node; confer :ref:`renewableprofiles`
To avoid too small values in the renewables` per-unit availability time series values below this threshold are set to zero.

column5: "True: In nodes where there is no offwind-ac generation
column6: adds a zero-capacity offwind-ac generator so that offwind-ac is considered for capacity expansion. It is done in the ``add_electricity`` rule."
